lustre/tests/openunlink.c

00035 #include <stdio.h>
00036 #include <fcntl.h>
00037 #include <string.h>
00038 #include <errno.h>
00039 #include <sys/types.h>
00040 #include <sys/stat.h>
00041 #include <stdlib.h>
00042 #include <unistd.h>
00043 
00044 #define T1 "write data before unlink\n"
00045 #define T2 "write data after unlink\n"
00046 char buf[128];
00047 
00048 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00049 {
00050         char *fname, *fname2;
00051         struct stat st;
00052         int fd, rc;
00053 
00054         if (argc < 2 || argc > 3) {
00055                 fprintf(stderr, "usage: %s filename [filename2]\n", argv[0]);
00056                 exit(1);
00057         }
00058 
00059         fname = argv[1];
00060         if (argc == 3)
00061                 fname2 = argv[2];
00062         else
00063                 fname2 = argv[1];
00064 
00065         fprintf(stderr, "opening\n");
00066         fd = open(fname, O_RDWR | O_TRUNC | O_CREAT, 0644);
00067         if (fd == -1) {
00068                 fprintf(stderr, "open (normal) %s\n", strerror(errno));
00069                 exit(1);
00070         }
00071 
00072         fprintf(stderr, "writing\n");
00073         rc = write(fd, T1, strlen(T1) + 1);
00074         if (rc != strlen(T1) + 1) {
00075                 fprintf(stderr, "write (normal) %s (rc %d)\n",
00076                         strerror(errno), rc);
00077                 exit(1);
00078         }
00079 
00080         if (argc == 3) {
00081                 fprintf (stderr, "unlinking %s\n", fname2);
00082                 rc = unlink(fname2);
00083                 if (rc) {
00084                         fprintf(stderr, "unlink %s\n", strerror(errno));
00085                         exit(1);
00086                 }
00087         } else {
00088                 printf("unlink %s and press enter\n", fname);
00089                 getc(stdin);
00090         }
00091 
00092         fprintf(stderr, "accessing (1)\n");
00093         if (access(fname, F_OK) == 0) {
00094                 fprintf(stderr, "%s still exists\n", fname);
00095                 exit(1);
00096         }
00097 
00098         fprintf(stderr, "seeking (1)\n");
00099         rc = lseek(fd, 0, SEEK_SET);
00100         if (rc) {
00101                 fprintf(stderr, "seek %s\n", strerror(errno));
00102                 exit(1);
00103         }
00104 
00105         fprintf(stderr, "accessing (2)\n");
00106         if (access(fname, F_OK) == 0) {
00107                 fprintf(stderr, "%s still exists\n", fname);
00108                 exit(1);
00109         }
00110 
00111         fprintf(stderr, "fstat...\n");
00112         rc = fstat(fd, &st);
00113         if (rc) {
00114                 fprintf(stderr, "fstat (unlink) %s\n", strerror(errno));
00115                 exit(1);
00116         }
00117         if (st.st_nlink != 0)
00118                 fprintf(stderr, "st_nlink = %d\n", (int)st.st_nlink);
00119 
00120         fprintf(stderr, "reading\n");
00121         rc = read(fd, buf, strlen(T1) + 1);
00122         if (rc != strlen(T1) + 1) {
00123                 fprintf(stderr, "read (unlink) %s (rc %d)\n",
00124                         strerror(errno), rc);
00125                 exit(1);
00126         }
00127 
00128         fprintf(stderr, "comparing data\n");
00129         if (memcmp(buf, T1, strlen(T1) + 1) ) {
00130                 fprintf(stderr, "FAILURE: read wrong data after unlink\n");
00131                 exit(1);
00132         }
00133 
00134         fprintf(stderr, "truncating\n");
00135         rc = ftruncate(fd, 0);
00136         if (rc) {
00137                 fprintf(stderr, "truncate (unlink) %s\n", strerror(errno));
00138                 exit(1);
00139         }
00140 
00141         fprintf(stderr, "seeking (2)\n");
00142         rc = lseek(fd, 0, SEEK_SET);
00143         if (rc) {
00144                 fprintf(stderr, "seek (after unlink trunc) %s\n",
00145                         strerror(errno));
00146                 exit(1);
00147         }
00148 
00149         fprintf(stderr, "writing again\n");
00150         rc = write(fd, T2, strlen(T2) + 1);
00151         if (rc != strlen(T2) + 1) {
00152                 fprintf(stderr, "write (after unlink trunc) %s (rc %d)\n",
00153                         strerror(errno), rc);
00154                 exit(1);
00155         }
00156 
00157         fprintf(stderr, "seeking (3)\n");
00158         rc = lseek(fd, 0, SEEK_SET);
00159         if (rc) {
00160                 fprintf(stderr, "seek (before unlink read) %s\n",
00161                         strerror(errno));
00162                 exit(1);
00163         }
00164 
00165         fprintf(stderr, "reading again\n");
00166         rc = read(fd, buf, strlen(T2) + 1);
00167         if (rc != strlen(T2) + 1) {
00168                 fprintf(stderr, "read (after unlink rewrite) %s (rc %d)\n",
00169                         strerror(errno), rc);
00170                 exit(1);
00171         }
00172 
00173         fprintf(stderr, "comparing data again\n");
00174         if (memcmp(buf, T2, strlen(T2) + 1)) {
00175                 fprintf(stderr, "FAILURE: read wrong data after rewrite\n");
00176                 exit(1);
00177         }
00178 
00179         fprintf(stderr, "closing\n");
00180         rc = close(fd);
00181         if (rc) {
00182                 fprintf(stderr, "close (unlink) %s\n", strerror(errno));
00183                 exit(1);
00184         }
00185 
00186         fprintf(stderr, "SUCCESS - goto beer\n");
00187         return 0;
00188 }
Generated on Sun Jun 5 20:55:36 2016 for Lustre by doxygen 1.6.1
